title: Soft White Bread
ingredients: ['2 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '4 tablespoons warm water (45 degrees C)', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '500g plain flour', '4 tablespoons instant mash potato flakes', '4 tablespoons dried milk powder', '2 teaspoons salt', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '25g margarine', '250ml warm water (45 degrees C)']
